<!-- Code generated from the comments of the Play struct in provisioner/ansible-navigator-remote/provisioner.go; DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY -->

Play represents a single Ansible play execution with its configuration.
It supports both traditional playbook files and Ansible Collection role FQDNs.
Each play can have its own variables, tags, and privilege escalation settings.

<!-- End of code generated from the comments of the Play struct in provisioner/ansible-navigator-remote/provisioner.go; -->
